Pre-Game Insights: India had an optional training session in the lead-up to the match against Netherlands
India bowling coach Paras Mhambrey confirmed that no player would be rested for the match
Hardik Pandya, who suffered from cramps towards the end of Pakistan match, is 'alright and fit to play'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The weather forecast in Sydney is better with less chances of rain interruption compared to the India versus Pakistan match
